title: DTL to UNIX Time Converter
name: LGF_DTLToUnixTime
description:
## Short description ##

This function converts the date and time of data type DTL to the UNIX time of data type DInt. The timestamp is calculated in UTC. This means that the time zone is not considered.
Only times after 01/01/1990 are permitted.

input.name: timeDTL
input.description: Date and time as DTL to convert to UNIX time

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification
